pageContext.public_note: To enroll via e-mail, please contact Michael@play-well.org, or call (424) 672-5496. Spaces are limited and enrollment is first-come, first-served.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Tap into your imagination with tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Build engineer-designed projects such as: Boats, Snowmobiles, and Merry-Go-Rounds. Design and build as never before and explore your craziest ideas.
pageContext.course_type_name: Intro to STEM with LEGO® Materials, Fall
